<P STYLE="margin-top:12px;margin-bottom:0px"><FONT STYLE="font-family:ARIAL" SIZE="1"><I>Refer to the Non-GAAP Financial Measures section of this document for additional information regarding Adjusted Pro Forma financial results. </I></FONT></P>
<P STYLE="font-size:12px;margin-top:0px;margin-bottom:0px">&nbsp;</P>
<TABLE STYLE="BORDER-COLLAPSE:COLLAPSE" BORDER="0" CELLPADDING="0" CELLSPACING="0" WIDTH="100%">
<TR>
<TD WIDTH="3%" VALIGN="top" ALIGN="left"><FONT STYLE="font-family:ARIAL" SIZE="1">(a)</FONT></TD>
<TD ALIGN="left" VALIGN="top"><FONT STYLE="font-family:ARIAL" SIZE="1">Represents GAAP results for the period. </FONT></TD></TR></TABLE>
<TABLE STYLE="BORDER-COLLAPSE:COLLAPSE" BORDER="0" CELLPADDING="0" CELLSPACING="0" WIDTH="100%">
<TR>
<TD WIDTH="3%" VALIGN="top" ALIGN="left"><FONT STYLE="font-family:ARIAL" SIZE="1">(b)</FONT></TD>
<TD ALIGN="left" VALIGN="top"><FONT STYLE="font-family:ARIAL" SIZE="1">Adjustment to eliminate the financial results of Kraft Foods Group, Inc. (&#147;KFG&#148;) from operations. The KFG Operation will be classified as a discontinued operation in
accordance with GAAP beginning in the fourth quarter of 2012, the period in which the spin-off of the business occurred and prior historical results will be revised to conform to the discontinued operations presentation. Historical results were
derived from KFG&#146;s unaudited interim combined financial statements included in the KFG Form 10 and were adjusted as follows: (i)&nbsp;to exclude certain corporate and business unit costs that were allocated to KFG as well as dis-synergies which
we expect to continue at Mondel&#275;z International after the Spin-Off; (ii)&nbsp;to reduce interest expense to remove the interest expense related to the $4 billion of debt migrated to KFG in July 2012 as if it was migrated effective
January&nbsp;1, 2011; (iii)&nbsp;to exclude royalty income historically reported by KFG that we will not pay following the Distribution Date and to exclude intercompany sales from KFG to Mondel&#275;z International in order to properly reflect net
revenues from continuing operations. </FONT></TD></TR></TABLE>
<TABLE STYLE="BORDER-COLLAPSE:COLLAPSE" BORDER="0" CELLPADDING="0" CELLSPACING="0" WIDTH="100%">
<TR>
<TD WIDTH="3%" VALIGN="top" ALIGN="left"><FONT STYLE="font-family:ARIAL" SIZE="1">(c)</FONT></TD>
<TD ALIGN="left" VALIGN="top"><FONT STYLE="font-family:ARIAL" SIZE="1">Removal of $64 million of Integration Program costs and related taxes; these costs directly related to integrating the 2010 Cadbury acquisition and have been removed from the
unaudited adjusted pro forma consolidated statements of earnings to provide improved transparency and comparability of our operating results. </FONT></TD></TR></TABLE>
<TABLE STYLE="BORDER-COLLAPSE:COLLAPSE" BORDER="0" CELLPADDING="0" CELLSPACING="0" WIDTH="100%">
<TR>
<TD WIDTH="3%" VALIGN="top" ALIGN="left"><FONT STYLE="font-family:ARIAL" SIZE="1">(d)</FONT></TD>
<TD ALIGN="left" VALIGN="top"><FONT STYLE="font-family:ARIAL" SIZE="1">Removal of $984 million of one-time Spin-Off transaction, transition and financing and related costs and related taxes; these costs directly relate to the Spin-Off of KFG and not
recur and as such, have been removed from the unaudited adjusted pro forma consolidated statements of earnings. </FONT></TD></TR></TABLE>
<TABLE STYLE="BORDER-COLLAPSE:COLLAPSE" BORDER="0" CELLPADDING="0" CELLSPACING="0" WIDTH="100%">
<TR>
<TD WIDTH="3%" VALIGN="top" ALIGN="left"><FONT STYLE="font-family:ARIAL" SIZE="1">(e)</FONT></TD>
<TD ALIGN="left" VALIGN="top"><FONT STYLE="font-family:ARIAL" SIZE="1">Removal of $69 million of restructuring and implementation costs and related taxes; these costs directly relate to optimizing our businesses for future operations (the
&#147;2012-2014 Restructuring Program&#148;) and have been removed from the unaudited adjusted pro forma consolidated statement of earnings to provide improved transparency and comparability of our operating results. </FONT></TD></TR></TABLE>
<TABLE STYLE="BORDER-COLLAPSE:COLLAPSE" BORDER="0" CELLPADDING="0" CELLSPACING="0" WIDTH="100%">
<TR>
<TD WIDTH="3%" VALIGN="top" ALIGN="left"><FONT STYLE="font-family:ARIAL" SIZE="1">(f)</FONT></TD>
<TD ALIGN="left" VALIGN="top"><FONT STYLE="font-family:ARIAL" SIZE="1">Reduction in our estimated annual benefit plan expense as a result of transferring certain benefit plan obligations to KFG in the Spin-Off. The reduction in benefit plan expense
is estimated to be approximately $90 million, which reflects a 2012 estimate based on market conditions and benefit plan assumptions as of January&nbsp;1, 2012. For the nine months ended September&nbsp;30, 2012, a prorated estimate of $68 million
was reflected. The estimates may change significantly as we finalize the amount of net liability transfers and the impacts on our statement of earnings during the fourth quarter of 2012. </FONT></TD></TR></TABLE>
<TABLE STYLE="BORDER-COLLAPSE:COLLAPSE" BORDER="0" CELLPADDING="0" CELLSPACING="0" WIDTH="100%">
<TR>
<TD WIDTH="3%" VALIGN="top" ALIGN="left"><FONT STYLE="font-family:ARIAL" SIZE="1">(g)</FONT></TD>
<TD ALIGN="left" VALIGN="top"><FONT STYLE="font-family:ARIAL" SIZE="1">An adjustment to remove $135 million of interest expense and related taxes. This adjustment is based on the assumed reduction of $6 billion of our debt on January&nbsp;1, 2011
from the utilization of funds received from the $6 billion of notes KFG issued directly and cash proceeds distributed to us in June 2012 in connection with our Spin-Off capitalization plan. Note during the nine months ended September&nbsp;30, 2012,
a portion of the $6 billion of debt was retired. As such, we adjusted interest expense during this period as if this debt had been repaid on January&nbsp;1, 2011 to ensure consistency of our assumption and related results. </FONT></TD></TR></TABLE>

<TD VALIGN="bottom"><FONT SIZE="1">&nbsp;</FONT></TD>

<TD NOWRAP VALIGN="bottom"><FONT STYLE="font-family:ARIAL" SIZE="1"><I>&nbsp;&nbsp;</I></FONT></TD></TR>
</TABLE> <P STYLE="margin-top:12px;margin-bottom:0px"><FONT STYLE="font-family:ARIAL" SIZE="1"><I>Refer to the Non-GAAP Financial Measures section of this document for additional information regarding Adjusted Pro Forma
financial results. </I></FONT></P> <P STYLE="font-size:6px;margin-top:0px;margin-bottom:0px">&nbsp;</P>
<TABLE STYLE="BORDER-COLLAPSE:COLLAPSE" BORDER="0" CELLPADDING="0" CELLSPACING="0" WIDTH="100%">
<TR>
<TD WIDTH="3%" VALIGN="top" ALIGN="left"><FONT STYLE="font-family:ARIAL" SIZE="1">(a)</FONT></TD>
<TD ALIGN="left" VALIGN="top"><FONT STYLE="font-family:ARIAL" SIZE="1">Represents GAAP results for the period. </FONT></TD></TR></TABLE>
<TABLE STYLE="BORDER-COLLAPSE:COLLAPSE" BORDER="0" CELLPADDING="0" CELLSPACING="0" WIDTH="100%">
<TR>
<TD WIDTH="3%" VALIGN="top" ALIGN="left"><FONT STYLE="font-family:ARIAL" SIZE="1">(b)</FONT></TD>
<TD ALIGN="left" VALIGN="top"><FONT STYLE="font-family:ARIAL" SIZE="1">Adjustment to eliminate the financial results of Kraft Foods Group, Inc. (&#147;KFG&#148;) from operations. The KFG Operation will be classified as a discontinued operation in
accordance with GAAP beginning in the fourth quarter of 2012, the period in which the spin-off of the business occurred and prior historical results will be revised to conform to the discontinued operations presentation. Historical results were
derived from KFG&#146;s unaudited interim combined financial statements included in the KFG Form 10 and were adjusted as follows: (i)&nbsp;to exclude certain corporate and business unit costs that were allocated to KFG as well as dis-synergies which
we expect to continue at Mondel&#275;z International after the Spin-Off; (ii)&nbsp;to reduce interest expense to remove the interest expense related to the $4 billion of debt migrated to KFG in July 2012 as if it was migrated effective
January&nbsp;1, 2011; (iii)&nbsp;to exclude royalty income historically reported by KFG that we will not pay following the Distribution Date and to exclude intercompany sales from KFG to Mondel&#275;z International in order to properly reflect net
revenues from continuing operations. </FONT></TD></TR></TABLE>
<TABLE STYLE="BORDER-COLLAPSE:COLLAPSE" BORDER="0" CELLPADDING="0" CELLSPACING="0" WIDTH="100%">
<TR>
<TD WIDTH="3%" VALIGN="top" ALIGN="left"><FONT STYLE="font-family:ARIAL" SIZE="1">(c)</FONT></TD>
<TD ALIGN="left" VALIGN="top"><FONT STYLE="font-family:ARIAL" SIZE="1">Removal of $112 million of Integration Program costs and related taxes; these costs directly related to integrating the 2010 Cadbury acquisition and have been removed from the
unaudited adjusted pro forma consolidated statements of earnings to provide improved transparency and comparability of our operating results. </FONT></TD></TR></TABLE>
<TABLE STYLE="BORDER-COLLAPSE:COLLAPSE" BORDER="0" CELLPADDING="0" CELLSPACING="0" WIDTH="100%">
<TR>
<TD WIDTH="3%" VALIGN="top" ALIGN="left"><FONT STYLE="font-family:ARIAL" SIZE="1">(d)</FONT></TD>
<TD ALIGN="left" VALIGN="top"><FONT STYLE="font-family:ARIAL" SIZE="1">Reduction in our estimated annual benefit plan expense as a result of transferring certain benefit plan obligations to KFG in the Spin-Off. The reduction in benefit plan expense
is estimated to be approximately $90 million, which reflects a 2012 estimate based on market conditions and benefit plan assumptions as of January&nbsp;1, 2012. For the three months ended September&nbsp;30, 2012 and September&nbsp;30, 2011, a
prorated estimate of $23 million was reflected. The estimates may change significantly as we finalize the amount of net liability transfers and the impacts on our statement of earnings during the fourth quarter of 2012. </FONT></TD></TR></TABLE>
<TABLE STYLE="BORDER-COLLAPSE:COLLAPSE" BORDER="0" CELLPADDING="0" CELLSPACING="0" WIDTH="100%">
<TR>
<TD WIDTH="3%" VALIGN="top" ALIGN="left"><FONT STYLE="font-family:ARIAL" SIZE="1">(e)</FONT></TD>
<TD ALIGN="left" VALIGN="top"><FONT STYLE="font-family:ARIAL" SIZE="1">An adjustment to remove $78 million of interest expense and related taxes. This adjustment is based on the assumed reduction of $6 billion of our debt on January&nbsp;1, 2011
from the utilization of funds received from the $6 billion of notes KFG issued directly and cash proceeds distributed to us in June 2012 in connection with our Spin-Off capitalization plan. </FONT></TD></TR></TABLE>

<p Style='page-break-before:always'>

</TABLE> <P STYLE="margin-top:12px;margin-bottom:0px"><FONT STYLE="font-family:ARIAL" SIZE="1"><I>Refer to the Non-GAAP Financial Measures section of this document for additional information regarding Adjusted Pro Forma
financial results. </I></FONT></P> <P STYLE="font-size:6px;margin-top:0px;margin-bottom:0px">&nbsp;</P>
<TABLE STYLE="BORDER-COLLAPSE:COLLAPSE" BORDER="0" CELLPADDING="0" CELLSPACING="0" WIDTH="100%">
<TR>
<TD WIDTH="3%" VALIGN="top" ALIGN="left"><FONT STYLE="font-family:ARIAL" SIZE="1">(a)</FONT></TD>
<TD ALIGN="left" VALIGN="top"><FONT STYLE="font-family:ARIAL" SIZE="1">Represents GAAP results for the period. </FONT></TD></TR></TABLE>
<TABLE STYLE="BORDER-COLLAPSE:COLLAPSE" BORDER="0" CELLPADDING="0" CELLSPACING="0" WIDTH="100%">
<TR>
<TD WIDTH="3%" VALIGN="top" ALIGN="left"><FONT STYLE="font-family:ARIAL" SIZE="1">(b)</FONT></TD>
<TD ALIGN="left" VALIGN="top"><FONT STYLE="font-family:ARIAL" SIZE="1">Adjustment to eliminate the financial results of Kraft Foods Group, Inc. (&#147;KFG&#148;) from operations. The KFG Operation will be classified as a discontinued operation in
accordance with GAAP beginning in the fourth quarter of 2012, the period in which the spin-off of the business occurred and prior historical results will be revised to conform to the discontinued operations presentation. Historical results were
derived from KFG&#146;s unaudited interim combined financial statements included in the KFG Form 10 and were adjusted as follows: (i)&nbsp;to exclude certain corporate and business unit costs that were allocated to KFG as well as dis-synergies which
we expect to continue at Mondel&#275;z International after the Spin-Off; (ii)&nbsp;to reduce interest expense to remove the interest expense related to the $4 billion of debt migrated to KFG in July 2012 as if it was migrated effective
January&nbsp;1, 2011; (iii)&nbsp;to exclude royalty income historically reported by KFG that we will not pay following the Distribution Date and to exclude intercompany sales from KFG to Mondel&#275;z International in order to properly reflect net
revenues from continuing operations. </FONT></TD></TR></TABLE>
<TABLE STYLE="BORDER-COLLAPSE:COLLAPSE" BORDER="0" CELLPADDING="0" CELLSPACING="0" WIDTH="100%">
<TR>
<TD WIDTH="3%" VALIGN="top" ALIGN="left"><FONT STYLE="font-family:ARIAL" SIZE="1">(c)</FONT></TD>
<TD ALIGN="left" VALIGN="top"><FONT STYLE="font-family:ARIAL" SIZE="1">Removal of $352 million of Integration Program costs and related taxes; these costs directly related to integrating the 2010 Cadbury acquisition and have been removed from the
unaudited adjusted pro forma consolidated statements of earnings to provide improved transparency and comparability of our operating results. </FONT></TD></TR></TABLE>
<TABLE STYLE="BORDER-COLLAPSE:COLLAPSE" BORDER="0" CELLPADDING="0" CELLSPACING="0" WIDTH="100%">
<TR>
<TD WIDTH="3%" VALIGN="top" ALIGN="left"><FONT STYLE="font-family:ARIAL" SIZE="1">(d)</FONT></TD>
<TD ALIGN="left" VALIGN="top"><FONT STYLE="font-family:ARIAL" SIZE="1">Reduction in our estimated annual benefit plan expense as a result of transferring certain benefit plan obligations to KFG in the Spin-Off. The reduction in benefit plan expense
is estimated to be approximately $90 million, which reflects a 2012 estimate based on market conditions and benefit plan assumptions as of January&nbsp;1, 2012. For the nine months ended September&nbsp;30, 2012 and September&nbsp;30, 2011, a
prorated estimate of $68 million was reflected. The estimates may change significantly as we finalize the amount of net liability transfers and the impacts on our statement of earnings during the fourth quarter of 2012. </FONT></TD></TR></TABLE>
<TABLE STYLE="BORDER-COLLAPSE:COLLAPSE" BORDER="0" CELLPADDING="0" CELLSPACING="0" WIDTH="100%">
<TR>
<TD WIDTH="3%" VALIGN="top" ALIGN="left"><FONT STYLE="font-family:ARIAL" SIZE="1">(e)</FONT></TD>
<TD ALIGN="left" VALIGN="top"><FONT STYLE="font-family:ARIAL" SIZE="1">An adjustment to remove $233 million of interest expense and related taxes. This adjustment is based on the assumed reduction of $6 billion of our debt on January&nbsp;1, 2011
from the utilization of funds received from the $6 billion of notes KFG issued directly and cash proceeds distributed to us in June 2012 in connection with our Spin-Off capitalization plan. </FONT></TD></TR></TABLE>

<TD VALIGN="bottom"><FONT SIZE="1">&nbsp;</FONT></TD>
<TD VALIGN="bottom"><FONT SIZE="1">&nbsp;</FONT></TD>
<TD VALIGN="bottom" COLSPAN="2" ALIGN="center" STYLE="border-bottom:1px solid #000000"><FONT STYLE="font-family:ARIAL" SIZE="1"><B>GAAP</B></FONT></TD>
<TD VALIGN="bottom"><FONT SIZE="1">&nbsp;</FONT></TD>
<TD VALIGN="bottom"><FONT SIZE="1">&nbsp;</FONT></TD>
<TD VALIGN="bottom" COLSPAN="2" ALIGN="center" STYLE="border-bottom:1px solid #000000"><FONT STYLE="font-family:ARIAL" SIZE="1"><B>Kraft<BR>Foods<BR>Group<BR>Operation</B></FONT></TD>
<TD VALIGN="bottom"><FONT SIZE="1">&nbsp;</FONT></TD>
<TD VALIGN="bottom"><FONT SIZE="1">&nbsp;</FONT></TD>

<TABLE STYLE="BORDER-COLLAPSE:COLLAPSE" BORDER="0" CELLPADDING="0" CELLSPACING="0" WIDTH="100%">
<TR>
<TD WIDTH="3%" VALIGN="top" ALIGN="left"><FONT STYLE="font-family:ARIAL" SIZE="1">(a)</FONT></TD>
<TD ALIGN="left" VALIGN="top"><FONT STYLE="font-family:ARIAL" SIZE="1">Represents GAAP results for the period. </FONT></TD></TR></TABLE>
<TABLE STYLE="BORDER-COLLAPSE:COLLAPSE" BORDER="0" CELLPADDING="0" CELLSPACING="0" WIDTH="100%">
<TR>
<TD WIDTH="3%" VALIGN="top" ALIGN="left"><FONT STYLE="font-family:ARIAL" SIZE="1">(b)</FONT></TD>
<TD ALIGN="left" VALIGN="top"><FONT STYLE="font-family:ARIAL" SIZE="1">Adjustment to eliminate the financial results of Kraft Foods Group, Inc. (&#147;KFG&#148;) from operations. The KFG Operation will be classified as a discontinued operation in
accordance with GAAP beginning in the fourth quarter of 2012, the period in which the spin-off of the business occurred and prior historical results will be revised to conform to the discontinued operations presentation. Historical results were
derived from KFG&#146;s unaudited interim combined financial statements included in the KFG Form 10 and were adjusted as follows: (i)&nbsp;to exclude certain corporate and business unit costs that were allocated to KFG as well as dis-synergies which
we expect to continue at Mondel&#275;z International after the Spin-Off; (ii)&nbsp;to reduce interest expense to remove the interest expense related to the $4 billion of debt migrated to KFG in July 2012 as if it was migrated effective
January&nbsp;1, 2011; (iii)&nbsp;to exclude royalty income historically reported by KFG that we will not pay following the Distribution Date and to exclude intercompany sales from KFG to Mondel&#275;z International in order to properly reflect net
revenues from continuing operations. </FONT></TD></TR></TABLE>
<TABLE STYLE="BORDER-COLLAPSE:COLLAPSE" BORDER="0" CELLPADDING="0" CELLSPACING="0" WIDTH="100%">
<TR>
<TD WIDTH="3%" VALIGN="top" ALIGN="left"><FONT STYLE="font-family:ARIAL" SIZE="1">(c)</FONT></TD>
<TD ALIGN="left" VALIGN="top"><FONT STYLE="font-family:ARIAL" SIZE="1">Remove the net reversal of $14 million of Integration Program costs for the three months ended September&nbsp;30, 2012 and charges of $112 million of Integration Program costs
for the three months ended September&nbsp;30, 2011; these costs directly related to integrating the 2010 Cadbury acquisition and have been removed from unaudited adjusted pro forma operating income to provide improved transparency and comparability
of our operating results. </FONT></TD></TR></TABLE>
<TABLE STYLE="BORDER-COLLAPSE:COLLAPSE" BORDER="0" CELLPADDING="0" CELLSPACING="0" WIDTH="100%">
<TR>
<TD WIDTH="3%" VALIGN="top" ALIGN="left"><FONT STYLE="font-family:ARIAL" SIZE="1">(d)</FONT></TD>
<TD ALIGN="left" VALIGN="top"><FONT STYLE="font-family:ARIAL" SIZE="1">Remove one-time Spin-Off transaction and transition costs of $226 million for the three months ended September&nbsp;30, 2012; these costs directly relate to the Spin-Off of KFG
and not recur and as such, have been removed from unaudited adjusted pro forma operating income. </FONT></TD></TR></TABLE>
<TABLE STYLE="BORDER-COLLAPSE:COLLAPSE" BORDER="0" CELLPADDING="0" CELLSPACING="0" WIDTH="100%">
<TR>
<TD WIDTH="3%" VALIGN="top" ALIGN="left"><FONT STYLE="font-family:ARIAL" SIZE="1">(e)</FONT></TD>
<TD ALIGN="left" VALIGN="top"><FONT STYLE="font-family:ARIAL" SIZE="1">Remove restructuring and implementation costs of $18 million for the three months ended September&nbsp;30, 2012; these costs directly relate to optimizing our businesses for
future operations (the &#147;2012-2014 Restructuring Program&#148;) and have been removed from unaudited adjusted pro forma operating income to provide improved transparency and comparability of our operating results. </FONT></TD></TR></TABLE>
<TABLE STYLE="BORDER-COLLAPSE:COLLAPSE" BORDER="0" CELLPADDING="0" CELLSPACING="0" WIDTH="100%">
<TR>
<TD WIDTH="3%" VALIGN="top" ALIGN="left"><FONT STYLE="font-family:ARIAL" SIZE="1">(f)</FONT></TD>
<TD ALIGN="left" VALIGN="top"><FONT STYLE="font-family:ARIAL" SIZE="1">Reduction in our estimated annual benefit plan expense as a result of transferring certain benefit plan obligations to KFG in the Spin-Off. The reduction in benefit plan expense
is estimated to be approximately $90 million, which reflects a 2012 estimate based on market conditions and benefit plan assumptions as of January&nbsp;1, 2012. For the three months ended September&nbsp;30, 2012 and September&nbsp;30, 2011, a
prorated estimate of $23 million was reflected. The estimates may change significantly as we finalize the amount of net liability transfers and the impacts on our statement of earnings during the fourth quarter of 2012. </FONT></TD></TR></TABLE>

<p Style='page-break-before:always'>
<HR  SIZE="3" style="COLOR:#999999" WIDTH="100%" ALIGN="CENTER">

</TABLE> <P STYLE="margin-top:12px;margin-bottom:0px"><FONT STYLE="font-family:ARIAL" SIZE="1"><I>Refer to the Non-GAAP Financial Measures section of this document for additional information regarding Adjusted Pro Forma
financial results. </I></FONT></P> <P STYLE="font-size:6px;margin-top:0px;margin-bottom:0px">&nbsp;</P>
<TABLE STYLE="BORDER-COLLAPSE:COLLAPSE" BORDER="0" CELLPADDING="0" CELLSPACING="0" WIDTH="100%">
<TR>
<TD WIDTH="3%" VALIGN="top" ALIGN="left"><FONT STYLE="font-family:ARIAL" SIZE="1">(a)</FONT></TD>
<TD ALIGN="left" VALIGN="top"><FONT STYLE="font-family:ARIAL" SIZE="1">Represents GAAP results for the period. </FONT></TD></TR></TABLE>
<TABLE STYLE="BORDER-COLLAPSE:COLLAPSE" BORDER="0" CELLPADDING="0" CELLSPACING="0" WIDTH="100%">
<TR>
<TD WIDTH="3%" VALIGN="top" ALIGN="left"><FONT STYLE="font-family:ARIAL" SIZE="1">(b)</FONT></TD>
<TD ALIGN="left" VALIGN="top"><FONT STYLE="font-family:ARIAL" SIZE="1">Adjustment to eliminate the financial results of Kraft Foods Group, Inc. (&#147;KFG&#148;) from operations. The KFG Operation will be classified as a discontinued operation in
accordance with GAAP beginning in the fourth quarter of 2012, the period in which the spin-off of the business occurred and prior historical results will be revised to conform to the discontinued operations presentation. Historical results were
derived from KFG&#146;s unaudited interim combined financial statements included in the KFG Form 10 and were adjusted as follows: (i)&nbsp;to exclude certain corporate and business unit costs that were allocated to KFG as well as dis-synergies which
we expect to continue at Mondel&#275;z International after the Spin-Off; (ii)&nbsp;to reduce interest expense to remove the interest expense related to the $4 billion of debt migrated to KFG in July 2012 as if it was migrated effective
January&nbsp;1, 2011; (iii)&nbsp;to exclude royalty income historically reported by KFG that we will not pay following the Distribution Date and to exclude intercompany sales from KFG to Mondel&#275;z International in order to properly reflect net
revenues from continuing operations. </FONT></TD></TR></TABLE>
<TABLE STYLE="BORDER-COLLAPSE:COLLAPSE" BORDER="0" CELLPADDING="0" CELLSPACING="0" WIDTH="100%">
<TR>
<TD WIDTH="3%" VALIGN="top" ALIGN="left"><FONT STYLE="font-family:ARIAL" SIZE="1">(c)</FONT></TD>
<TD ALIGN="left" VALIGN="top"><FONT STYLE="font-family:ARIAL" SIZE="1">Remove Integration Program costs of $64 million for the nine months ended September&nbsp;30, 2012 and $352 million for the nine months ended September&nbsp;30, 2011; these costs
directly related to integrating the 2010 Cadbury acquisition and have been removed from unaudited adjusted pro forma operating income to provide improved transparency and comparability of our operating results. </FONT></TD></TR></TABLE>
<TABLE STYLE="BORDER-COLLAPSE:COLLAPSE" BORDER="0" CELLPADDING="0" CELLSPACING="0" WIDTH="100%">
<TR>
<TD WIDTH="3%" VALIGN="top" ALIGN="left"><FONT STYLE="font-family:ARIAL" SIZE="1">(d)</FONT></TD>
<TD ALIGN="left" VALIGN="top"><FONT STYLE="font-family:ARIAL" SIZE="1">Remove one-time Spin-Off transaction and transition costs of $365 million for the nine months ended September&nbsp;30, 2012; these costs directly relate to the Spin-Off of KFG
and not recur and as such, have been removed from unaudited adjusted pro forma operating income. </FONT></TD></TR></TABLE>
<TABLE STYLE="BORDER-COLLAPSE:COLLAPSE" BORDER="0" CELLPADDING="0" CELLSPACING="0" WIDTH="100%">
<TR>
<TD WIDTH="3%" VALIGN="top" ALIGN="left"><FONT STYLE="font-family:ARIAL" SIZE="1">(e)</FONT></TD>
<TD ALIGN="left" VALIGN="top"><FONT STYLE="font-family:ARIAL" SIZE="1">Remove restructuring and implementation costs of $69 million for the nine months ended September&nbsp;30, 2012; these costs directly relate to optimizing our businesses for
future operations (the &#147;2012-2014 Restructuring Program&#148;) and have been removed from unaudited adjusted pro forma operating income to provide improved transparency and comparability of our operating results. </FONT></TD></TR></TABLE>
<TABLE STYLE="BORDER-COLLAPSE:COLLAPSE" BORDER="0" CELLPADDING="0" CELLSPACING="0" WIDTH="100%">
<TR>
<TD WIDTH="3%" VALIGN="top" ALIGN="left"><FONT STYLE="font-family:ARIAL" SIZE="1">(f)</FONT></TD>
<TD ALIGN="left" VALIGN="top"><FONT STYLE="font-family:ARIAL" SIZE="1">Reduction in our estimated annual benefit plan expense as a result of transferring certain benefit plan obligations to KFG in the Spin-Off. The reduction in benefit plan expense
is estimated to be approximately $90 million, which reflects a 2012 estimate based on market conditions and benefit plan assumptions as of January&nbsp;1, 2012. For the nine months ended September&nbsp;30, 2012 and September&nbsp;30, 2011, a
prorated estimate of $68 million was reflected. The estimates may change significantly as we finalize the amount of net liability transfers and the impacts on our statement of earnings during the fourth quarter of 2012. </FONT></TD></TR></TABLE>

<TD VALIGN="bottom"><FONT SIZE="1">&nbsp;</FONT></TD>
<TD VALIGN="bottom" COLSPAN="2" ALIGN="center"><FONT STYLE="font-family:ARIAL" SIZE="1"><B><SUP STYLE="vertical-align:baseline; position:relative; bottom:.8ex">(a)</SUP></B></FONT></TD>

</TABLE> <P STYLE="margin-top:12px;margin-bottom:0px"><FONT STYLE="font-family:ARIAL" SIZE="1"><I>Refer to the Non-GAAP Financial Measures section of this document for additional information regarding Adjusted Pro Forma
financial results. </I></FONT></P> <P STYLE="font-size:6px;margin-top:0px;margin-bottom:0px">&nbsp;</P>
<TABLE STYLE="BORDER-COLLAPSE:COLLAPSE" BORDER="0" CELLPADDING="0" CELLSPACING="0" WIDTH="100%">
<TR>
<TD WIDTH="3%" VALIGN="top" ALIGN="left"><FONT STYLE="font-family:ARIAL" SIZE="1">(a)</FONT></TD>
<TD ALIGN="left" VALIGN="top"><FONT STYLE="font-family:ARIAL" SIZE="1">Represents GAAP results for the period. </FONT></TD></TR></TABLE>
<TABLE STYLE="BORDER-COLLAPSE:COLLAPSE" BORDER="0" CELLPADDING="0" CELLSPACING="0" WIDTH="100%">
<TR>
<TD WIDTH="3%" VALIGN="top" ALIGN="left"><FONT STYLE="font-family:ARIAL" SIZE="1">(b)</FONT></TD>
<TD ALIGN="left" VALIGN="top"><FONT STYLE="font-family:ARIAL" SIZE="1">Adjustment to eliminate the financial results of Kraft Foods Group, Inc. (&#147;KFG&#148;) from operations. The KFG Operation will be classified as a discontinued operation in
accordance with GAAP beginning in the fourth quarter of 2012, the period in which the spin-off of the business occurred and prior historical results will be revised to conform to the discontinued operations presentation. Historical results were
derived from KFG&#146;s unaudited interim combined financial statements included in the KFG Form 10 and were adjusted as follows: (i)&nbsp;to exclude certain corporate and business unit costs that were allocated to KFG as well as dis-synergies which
we expect to continue at Mondel&#275;z International after the Spin-Off; (ii)&nbsp;to reduce interest expense to remove the interest expense related to the $4 billion of debt migrated to KFG in July 2012 as if it was migrated effective
January&nbsp;1, 2011; (iii)&nbsp;to exclude royalty income historically reported by KFG that we will not pay following the Distribution Date and to exclude intercompany sales from KFG to Mondel&#275;z International in order to properly reflect net
revenues from continuing operations. </FONT></TD></TR></TABLE>

</TABLE> <P STYLE="margin-top:12px;margin-bottom:0px"><FONT STYLE="font-family:ARIAL" SIZE="1"><I>Refer to the Non-GAAP Financial Measures section of this document for additional information regarding Adjusted Pro Forma
financial results. </I></FONT></P> <P STYLE="font-size:6px;margin-top:0px;margin-bottom:0px">&nbsp;</P>
<TABLE STYLE="BORDER-COLLAPSE:COLLAPSE" BORDER="0" CELLPADDING="0" CELLSPACING="0" WIDTH="100%">
<TR>
<TD WIDTH="3%" VALIGN="top" ALIGN="left"><FONT STYLE="font-family:ARIAL" SIZE="1">(a)</FONT></TD>
<TD ALIGN="left" VALIGN="top"><FONT STYLE="font-family:ARIAL" SIZE="1">Represents GAAP results for the period. </FONT></TD></TR></TABLE>
<TABLE STYLE="BORDER-COLLAPSE:COLLAPSE" BORDER="0" CELLPADDING="0" CELLSPACING="0" WIDTH="100%">
<TR>
<TD WIDTH="3%" VALIGN="top" ALIGN="left"><FONT STYLE="font-family:ARIAL" SIZE="1">(b)</FONT></TD>
<TD ALIGN="left" VALIGN="top"><FONT STYLE="font-family:ARIAL" SIZE="1">Adjustment to eliminate the financial results of Kraft Foods Group, Inc. (&#147;KFG&#148;) from operations. The KFG Operation will be classified as a discontinued operation in
accordance with GAAP beginning in the fourth quarter of 2012, the period in which the spin-off of the business occurred and prior historical results will be revised to conform to the discontinued operations presentation. Historical results were
derived from KFG&#146;s unaudited interim combined financial statements included in the KFG Form 10 and were adjusted as follows: (i)&nbsp;to exclude certain corporate and business unit costs that were allocated to KFG as well as dis-synergies which
we expect to continue at Mondel&#275;z International after the Spin-Off; (ii)&nbsp;to reduce interest expense to remove the interest expense related to the $4 billion of debt migrated to KFG in July 2012 as if it was migrated effective
January&nbsp;1, 2011; (iii)&nbsp;to exclude royalty income historically reported by KFG that we will not pay following the Distribution Date and to exclude intercompany sales from KFG to Mondel&#275;z International in order to properly reflect net
revenues from continuing operations. </FONT></TD></TR></TABLE>

</TABLE> <P STYLE="margin-top:12px;margin-bottom:0px"><FONT STYLE="font-family:ARIAL" SIZE="2"><I>Refer to the Non-GAAP Financial Measures section of this document for additional information regarding Adjusted Pro Forma
financial results. </I></FONT></P> <P STYLE="font-size:12px;margin-top:0px;margin-bottom:0px">&nbsp;</P>
<TABLE STYLE="BORDER-COLLAPSE:COLLAPSE" BORDER="0" CELLPADDING="0" CELLSPACING="0" WIDTH="100%">
<TR>
<TD WIDTH="4%" VALIGN="top" ALIGN="left"><FONT STYLE="font-family:ARIAL" SIZE="2">(a)</FONT></TD>
<TD ALIGN="left" VALIGN="top"><FONT STYLE="font-family:ARIAL" SIZE="2">Represents GAAP results for the period. </FONT></TD></TR></TABLE>
<TABLE STYLE="BORDER-COLLAPSE:COLLAPSE" BORDER="0" CELLPADDING="0" CELLSPACING="0" WIDTH="100%">
<TR>
<TD WIDTH="4%" VALIGN="top" ALIGN="left"><FONT STYLE="font-family:ARIAL" SIZE="2">(b)</FONT></TD>
<TD ALIGN="left" VALIGN="top"><FONT STYLE="font-family:ARIAL" SIZE="2">Adjustment to eliminate the financial results of Kraft Foods Group, Inc. (&#147;KFG&#148;) from operations. The KFG Operation will be classified as a discontinued operation in
accordance with GAAP beginning in the fourth quarter of 2012, the period in which the spin-off of the business occurred and prior historical results will be revised to conform to the discontinued operations presentation. Historical results were
derived from KFG&#146;s unaudited interim combined financial statements included in the KGF Form 10 and were adjusted as follows: (i)&nbsp;to exclude certain corporate and business unit costs that were allocated to KFG as well as dis-synergies which
we expect to continue at Mondel&#275;z International after the Spin-Off; (ii)&nbsp;to reduce interest expense to remove the interest expense related to the $4 billion of debt migrated to KFG in July 2012 as if it was migrated effective
January&nbsp;1, 2011; (iii)&nbsp;to exclude royalty income historically reported by KFG that we will not pay following the Distribution Date and to exclude intercompany sales from KFG to Mondel&#275;z International in order to properly reflect net
revenues from continuing operations. </FONT></TD></TR></TABLE>

<p Style='page-break-before:always'>

</TABLE> <P STYLE="margin-top:12px;margin-bottom:0px"><FONT STYLE="font-family:ARIAL" SIZE="1"><I><FONT STYLE="font-family:ARIAL" SIZE="1">Refer to the Non-GAAP Financial Measures section of this document for additional
information regarding Adjusted Pro Forma financial results. </FONT></I></FONT></P> <P STYLE="font-size:12px;margin-top:0px;margin-bottom:0px">&nbsp;</P>
<TABLE STYLE="BORDER-COLLAPSE:COLLAPSE" BORDER="0" CELLPADDING="0" CELLSPACING="0" WIDTH="100%">
<TR>
<TD WIDTH="4%" VALIGN="top" ALIGN="left"><FONT STYLE="font-family:ARIAL" SIZE="1"></FONT><FONT STYLE="font-family:ARIAL" SIZE="1">(a)</FONT></TD>
<TD ALIGN="left" VALIGN="top"><FONT STYLE="font-family:ARIAL" SIZE="1">Represents GAAP results for the period. </FONT></TD></TR></TABLE>
<TABLE STYLE="BORDER-COLLAPSE:COLLAPSE" BORDER="0" CELLPADDING="0" CELLSPACING="0" WIDTH="100%">
<TR>
<TD WIDTH="4%" VALIGN="top" ALIGN="left"><FONT STYLE="font-family:ARIAL" SIZE="1"></FONT><FONT STYLE="font-family:ARIAL" SIZE="1">(b)</FONT></TD>
<TD ALIGN="left" VALIGN="top"><FONT STYLE="font-family:ARIAL" SIZE="1">Adjustment to eliminate the financial results of Kraft Foods Group, Inc. (&#147;KFG&#148;) from operations. The KFG Operation will be classified as a discontinued operation in
accordance with GAAP beginning in the fourth quarter of 2012, the period in which the spin-off of the business occurred and prior historical results will be revised to conform to the discontinued operations presentation. Historical results were
derived from KFG&#146;s unaudited interim combined financial statements included in the KFG Form 10 and were adjusted as follows: (i)&nbsp;to exclude certain corporate and business unit costs that were allocated to KFG as well as dis-synergies which
we expect to continue at Mondel&#275;z International after the Spin-Off; (ii)&nbsp;to reduce interest expense to remove the interest expense related to the $4 billion of debt migrated to KFG in July 2012 as if it was migrated effective
January&nbsp;1, 2011; (iii)&nbsp;to exclude royalty income historically reported by KFG that we will not pay following the Distribution Date and to exclude intercompany sales from KFG to Mondel&#275;z International in order to properly reflect net
revenues from continuing operations. </FONT></TD></TR></TABLE>
<TABLE STYLE="BORDER-COLLAPSE:COLLAPSE" BORDER="0" CELLPADDING="0" CELLSPACING="0" WIDTH="100%">
<TR>
<TD WIDTH="4%" VALIGN="top" ALIGN="left"><FONT STYLE="font-family:ARIAL" SIZE="1"></FONT><FONT STYLE="font-family:ARIAL" SIZE="1">(c)</FONT></TD>
<TD ALIGN="left" VALIGN="top"><FONT STYLE="font-family:ARIAL" SIZE="1">Removal of Integration Program costs, net of taxes. </FONT></TD></TR></TABLE>
<TABLE STYLE="BORDER-COLLAPSE:COLLAPSE" BORDER="0" CELLPADDING="0" CELLSPACING="0" WIDTH="100%">
<TR>
<TD WIDTH="4%" VALIGN="top" ALIGN="left"><FONT STYLE="font-family:ARIAL" SIZE="1"></FONT><FONT STYLE="font-family:ARIAL" SIZE="1">(d)</FONT></TD>
<TD ALIGN="left" VALIGN="top"><FONT STYLE="font-family:ARIAL" SIZE="1">Removal of $452 million of one-time Spin-Off transaction, transition and financing and related costs, net of taxes for the three months ended September&nbsp;30, 2012; these costs
directly relate to the Spin-Off of KFG and will not recur. </FONT></TD></TR></TABLE>
<TABLE STYLE="BORDER-COLLAPSE:COLLAPSE" BORDER="0" CELLPADDING="0" CELLSPACING="0" WIDTH="100%">
<TR>
<TD WIDTH="4%" VALIGN="top" ALIGN="left"><FONT STYLE="font-family:ARIAL" SIZE="1"></FONT><FONT STYLE="font-family:ARIAL" SIZE="1">(e)</FONT></TD>
<TD ALIGN="left" VALIGN="top"><FONT STYLE="font-family:ARIAL" SIZE="1">Removal of $11 million of restructuring and implementation costs, net of taxes, for the three months ended September&nbsp;30, 2012; these costs directly relate to optimizing our
businesses for future operations (the &#147;2012-2014 Restructuring Program&#148;) and have been removed to provide improved transparency and comparability of our operating results. </FONT></TD></TR></TABLE>
<TABLE STYLE="BORDER-COLLAPSE:COLLAPSE" BORDER="0" CELLPADDING="0" CELLSPACING="0" WIDTH="100%">
<TR>
<TD WIDTH="4%" VALIGN="top" ALIGN="left"><FONT STYLE="font-family:ARIAL" SIZE="1"></FONT><FONT STYLE="font-family:ARIAL" SIZE="1">(f)</FONT></TD>
<TD ALIGN="left" VALIGN="top"><FONT STYLE="font-family:ARIAL" SIZE="1">Reduction in our estimated annual benefit plan expense as a result of transferring certain benefit plan obligations to KFG in the Spin-Off. The reduction in benefit plan expense
is estimated to be approximately $90 million pre-tax, which reflects a 2012 estimate based on market conditions and benefit plan assumptions as of January&nbsp;1, 2012. For the three months ended September&nbsp;30, 2012 and 2011, a prorated estimate
of $14 million net of taxes was reflected. The estimates may change significantly as we finalize the amount of net liability transfers and the impacts on our statement of earnings during the fourth quarter of 2012. </FONT></TD></TR></TABLE>
<TABLE STYLE="BORDER-COLLAPSE:COLLAPSE" BORDER="0" CELLPADDING="0" CELLSPACING="0" WIDTH="100%">
<TR>
<TD WIDTH="4%" VALIGN="top" ALIGN="left"><FONT STYLE="font-family:ARIAL" SIZE="1"></FONT><FONT STYLE="font-family:ARIAL" SIZE="1">(g)</FONT></TD>
<TD ALIGN="left" VALIGN="top"><FONT STYLE="font-family:ARIAL" SIZE="1">An adjustment to remove $16 million and $49 million of interest expense net of taxes for the three months ended September&nbsp;30, 2012 and 2011, respectively. This adjustment is
based on the assumed reduction of $6 billion of our debt on January&nbsp;1, 2011 from the utilization of funds received from the $6 billion of notes KFG issued directly and cash proceeds distributed to us in June 2012 in connection with our Spin-Off
capitalization plan. Note during the three months ended September&nbsp;30, 2012, a portion of the $6 billion of debt was retired. As such, we adjusted interest expense during this period as if this debt had been repaid on January&nbsp;1, 2011 to
ensure consistency of our assumption and related results. </FONT></TD></TR></TABLE>

<p Style='page-break-before:always'>
<HR  SIZE="3" style="COLOR:#999999" WIDTH="100%" ALIGN="CENTER">

</TABLE> <P STYLE="margin-top:12px;margin-bottom:0px"><FONT STYLE="font-family:ARIAL" SIZE="2"><I>Refer to the Non-GAAP Financial Measures section of this document for additional information regarding Adjusted Pro Forma
financial results. </I></FONT></P> <P STYLE="font-size:12px;margin-top:0px;margin-bottom:0px">&nbsp;</P>
<TABLE STYLE="BORDER-COLLAPSE:COLLAPSE" BORDER="0" CELLPADDING="0" CELLSPACING="0" WIDTH="100%">
<TR>
<TD WIDTH="3%" VALIGN="top" ALIGN="left"><FONT STYLE="font-family:ARIAL" SIZE="1">(a)</FONT></TD>
<TD ALIGN="left" VALIGN="top"><FONT STYLE="font-family:ARIAL" SIZE="1">Represents GAAP results for the period. </FONT></TD></TR></TABLE>
<TABLE STYLE="BORDER-COLLAPSE:COLLAPSE" BORDER="0" CELLPADDING="0" CELLSPACING="0" WIDTH="100%">
<TR>
<TD WIDTH="3%" VALIGN="top" ALIGN="left"><FONT STYLE="font-family:ARIAL" SIZE="1">(b)</FONT></TD>
<TD ALIGN="left" VALIGN="top"><FONT STYLE="font-family:ARIAL" SIZE="1">Adjustment to eliminate the financial results of Kraft Foods Group, Inc. (&#147;KFG&#148;) from operations. The KFG Operation will be classified as a discontinued operation in
accordance with GAAP beginning in the fourth quarter of 2012, the period in which the spin-off of the business occurred and prior historical results will be revised to conform to the discontinued operations presentation. Historical results were
derived from KFG&#146;s unaudited interim combined financial statements included in the KFG Form 10 and were adjusted as follows: (i)&nbsp;to exclude certain corporate and business unit costs that were allocated to KFG as well as dis-synergies which
we expect to continue at Mondel&#275;z International after the Spin-Off; (ii)&nbsp;to reduce interest expense to remove the interest expense related to the $4 billion of debt migrated to KFG in July 2012 as if it was migrated effective
January&nbsp;1, 2011; (iii)&nbsp;to exclude royalty income historically reported by KFG that we will not pay following the Distribution Date and to exclude intercompany sales from KFG to Mondel&#275;z International in order to properly reflect net
revenues from continuing operations. </FONT></TD></TR></TABLE>
<TABLE STYLE="BORDER-COLLAPSE:COLLAPSE" BORDER="0" CELLPADDING="0" CELLSPACING="0" WIDTH="100%">
<TR>
<TD WIDTH="3%" VALIGN="top" ALIGN="left"><FONT STYLE="font-family:ARIAL" SIZE="1">(c)</FONT></TD>
<TD ALIGN="left" VALIGN="top"><FONT STYLE="font-family:ARIAL" SIZE="1">Removal of Integration Program costs, net of taxes. </FONT></TD></TR></TABLE>
<TABLE STYLE="BORDER-COLLAPSE:COLLAPSE" BORDER="0" CELLPADDING="0" CELLSPACING="0" WIDTH="100%">
<TR>
<TD WIDTH="3%" VALIGN="top" ALIGN="left"><FONT STYLE="font-family:ARIAL" SIZE="1">(d)</FONT></TD>
<TD ALIGN="left" VALIGN="top"><FONT STYLE="font-family:ARIAL" SIZE="1">Removal of $654 million of one-time Spin-Off transaction, transition and financing and related costs, net of taxes for the nine months ended September&nbsp;30, 2012; these costs
directly relate to the Spin-Off of KFG and will not recur. </FONT></TD></TR></TABLE>
<TABLE STYLE="BORDER-COLLAPSE:COLLAPSE" BORDER="0" CELLPADDING="0" CELLSPACING="0" WIDTH="100%">
<TR>
<TD WIDTH="3%" VALIGN="top" ALIGN="left"><FONT STYLE="font-family:ARIAL" SIZE="1">(e)</FONT></TD>
<TD ALIGN="left" VALIGN="top"><FONT STYLE="font-family:ARIAL" SIZE="1">Removal of $43 million of restructuring and implementation costs, net of taxes, for the nine months ended September&nbsp;30, 2012; these costs directly relate to optimizing our
businesses for future operations (the &#147;2012-2014 Restructuring Program&#148;) and have been removed to provide improved transparency and comparability of our operating results. </FONT></TD></TR></TABLE>
<TABLE STYLE="BORDER-COLLAPSE:COLLAPSE" BORDER="0" CELLPADDING="0" CELLSPACING="0" WIDTH="100%">
<TR>
<TD WIDTH="3%" VALIGN="top" ALIGN="left"><FONT STYLE="font-family:ARIAL" SIZE="1">(f)</FONT></TD>
<TD ALIGN="left" VALIGN="top"><FONT STYLE="font-family:ARIAL" SIZE="1">Reduction in our estimated annual benefit plan expense as a result of transferring certain benefit plan obligations to KFG in the Spin-Off. The reduction in benefit plan expense
is estimated to be approximately $90 million pre-tax, which reflects a 2012 estimate based on market conditions and benefit plan assumptions as of January&nbsp;1, 2012. For the nine months ended September&nbsp;30, 2012 and 2011, a prorated estimate
of $42 million net of taxes was reflected. The estimates may change significantly as we finalize the amount of net liability transfers and the impacts on our statement of earnings during the fourth quarter of 2012. </FONT></TD></TR></TABLE>
<TABLE STYLE="BORDER-COLLAPSE:COLLAPSE" BORDER="0" CELLPADDING="0" CELLSPACING="0" WIDTH="100%">
<TR>
<TD WIDTH="3%" VALIGN="top" ALIGN="left"><FONT STYLE="font-family:ARIAL" SIZE="1">(g)</FONT></TD>
<TD ALIGN="left" VALIGN="top"><FONT STYLE="font-family:ARIAL" SIZE="1">An adjustment to remove $84 million and $145 million of interest expense net of taxes for the nine months ended September&nbsp;30, 2012 and 2011, respectively. This adjustment is
based on the assumed reduction of $6 billion of our debt on January&nbsp;1, 2011 from the utilization of funds received from the $6 billion of notes KFG issued directly and cash proceeds distributed to us in June 2012 in connection with our Spin-Off
capitalization plan. Note during the nine months ended September&nbsp;30, 2012, a portion of the $6 billion of debt was retired. As such, we adjusted interest expense during this period as if this debt had been repaid on January&nbsp;1, 2011 to
ensure consistency of our assumption and related results. </FONT></TD></TR></TABLE>
